name: Orders Up
description:
Orders Up is a puzzle game where your troops will blindly follow your orders!

You can issue orders to all of your troops with the goal of claiming the key and opening the chest in each level.

Select your soldiers with left click, undo your last order with right click, and restart the current level with "r"

Don't get too close to the enemy soldiers, and watch out for tiles that look different than the rest!

Good luck!
